detail_desc: Jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, front and back pockets and skinny legs.
Leather, knee-high boots with pointed toes. Leather linings, insoles and soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative frill over the shoulders.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, front pockets and a tie belt at the waist.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft and ribbed section over the foot for optimum fit and comfort.
Long skirt in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and high slits in the sides. Short jersey underskirt.
Calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a large, draped polo neck, dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides.

Blouse in woven fabric with a V-shaped opening at the front and a small frilled collar with ties. Buttons down the front, an elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with a button and frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Rhinestone-decorated metal earrings. The zinc in the metal is recycled.
Top in soft faux shearling with a stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.

Pyjamas in a patterned cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, short, wide sleeves, and short slits in the sides. Short shorts with an elasticated waist, button fly and side pockets.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, cable knit containing some wool with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Vest top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with decorative buttons down the front.
Short-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend. Low sweetheart neckline with an opening and decorative tie detail, and a seam under the bust.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Shorts in a linen and cotton weave with covered elastication at the back of the waist and a concealed drawstring at the front of the waistband. Zip fly and button, pockets in the side seams and jetted back pockets with a button.
Trousers in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with narrow hems.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a foldover polo neck and long sleeves.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and an asymmetric hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with oversized, raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Metal hair clips decorated with sparkly stones. Length 8.5 cm.
Top in soft, pima cotton jersey with a boat neck and long sleeves.
Shorter top in jersey with a frilled yoke, V-neck and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Elasticated seam and a frill trim at the hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in soft cotton flannel with toning trims. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long sleeves with narrow cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Hat in a soft cotton knit with appliqués at the top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.

Set with a top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and leggings in soft, printed cotton-blend jersey with appliqués on the front. Top with press-studs on one shoulder, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and wrapover ribbing at the hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Lightly padded sleep bag in soft, patterned jersey with a round, scallop-edged collar, press-stud on one shoulder and a concealed zip in one side that opens from the bottom. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.

Running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and mesh key pocket in the waistband. Layered over a pair of short running tights. The shorts are made partly from recycled polyester.
Straight-cut shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the front, buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Nightdress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short, elasticated raglan sleeves and an elasticated neckline.
Pull-on trousers in soft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and narrow elastication at the hems.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidered details, a sewn-in wrapover at the front, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Scalloped V-neck, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with raw, roll edges around the sleeves and hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Hat in supersoft pile with ear appliqués, and ear flaps with ties under the chin. Lined in patterned organic cotton jersey.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Decorative scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
V-neck playsuit in glittery velour. Wrapover front with a concealed press-stud, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs. Unlined.
Sandals with braided jute trims around the soles and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Running gloves in windproof functional fabric. The right glove has a reflective print on the uppers and the left glove has a small key pocket and concealed zip. Wide ribbing at the cuffs. Unlined.
Swimsuit with a print motif on the front with decorative appliqués at the top, narrow, contrasting colour shoulder straps that meet at the back and a small frill trim around the legs.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist with a concealed drawstring and key pocket, and short slits in the sides.
Vest top in soft jersey made partly from organic cotton.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.

Imitation leather hi-tops with fabric sections and a padded edge and tongue. Hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a decorative knot at the front and elastic with a metal fastener at the back. Width approx. 4 cm.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft and ribbed section over the foot for optimum fit and comfort.
Treggings in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and appliqués on the knees.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads. Elasticated tops.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, V-neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
V-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable strap in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 1.4 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.8 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ties at the hem.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend containing glittery threads with low dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Body in sturdy microfibre and lace with a shaping effect on the waist and seat. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape, and an opening and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
2-piece set with a longer sweatshirt and matching leggings in a cotton blend. Printed sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Patterned leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in a patterned weave with a round neckline, long sleeves and a concealed zip and hook and eye fastener at the back. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.

Calf-length dress in lightly crinkled jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves with narrow elastication at the ends and an elasticated seam at the waist. Decorative buttons at the top and classic buttons on the skirt. Unlined.
Leggings in a stretch cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jacket in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shopper in braided paper straw containing glittery threads. Embroidered motif on the front and two handles at the top with decorative tassels in neon colours. Contrasting colour lining. Depth 9.5 cm. Height 28 cm. Width 38 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and stripes down the sides of the legs.
